import NavBar from "./NavBar"; import SignOut from "./SignOut"; import './Style.css' function Officers() { return ( <> { data.slice((currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage, currentPage * itemsPerPage) .map((criminal, index)=>{ return }) }
{currentPage}
Select Criminal ID Name Address Phone
toggleSelection(index)} /> {criminal.Criminal_ID} {criminal.Name} {criminal.Address} {criminal.Phone}
) } export default Officers;
